# Helm of Comprehend Languages and Read Magic
## Overview
**Aura** faint divination; **CL** 4th

**Slot** head

**Price** 5,200 gp

**Weight** 3 lbs.

**Description**

Appearing as a normal helmet, a *helm of comprehend languages and read magic* grants its wearer the ability to understand the spoken words of any creature and to read text in any language and any magical writing. The wearer gains a +5 competence bonus on [[Linguistics (Skill)|Linguistics]] checks to understand messages written in incomplete, archaic, or exotic forms. Note that understanding a magical text does not necessarily imply spell use.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|comprehend languages]]**,* *[[Read Magic (Spell)|read magic]]*

**Cost** 2,600 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 518
